---
title: "Changelog"
engine: julia
---

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

changelog = read(joinpath(@__DIR__, "..", "..", "CHANGELOG.md"), String)

if !contains(changelog, r"## v\d")
    println("::: {.callout-note}")
    println("## No releases yet")
    println()
    println("This package has not published a release yet.")
    println(":::")
    println()
end

print(changelog)
```
